title: After an officer allegedly assaulted a dispatcher, Natick kept it secret
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Plus, Harvard University historian Jill Lepore is back with the third season of her podcast, "The Last Archive," this time exploring solutions to the problems of online misinformation.
